channel.title: Making basic Clue Scrolls

item.title: Making basic Clue Scrolls
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

This isn’t a “OMFGPROWTFUHAX” Clue scroll base, it’s just what I thought of out of thin air and YES, it works.

note: I am only posting this here so if it’s anywhere else, the poster fails.

[center][b]Difficulty: 0/10 C&P (or 10/10 if you’re a retard.)
Time it takes?: 1 min?
Tested On: Project Fox (Czar) <or wL v3 as someone claims.

First, open the file which contains your eating. DeltaScape would use “Potions.JAVA”. My server would use Client.JAVA

Now, where your food is declared, put this:

case 952: //Spade if (absX == 3012 && absY == 3373 && playerHasItemAmount(2677,1)) { addItem(405, 1); deleteItem(2677, getItemSlot(2677), 3); setAnimation(830); sendMessage("You begin to dig."); } if (absX == 3227 && absY == 3201 && playerHasItemAmount(2678,1)) { addItem(2679, 1); deleteItem(2678, getItemSlot(2678), 3); setAnimation(830); sendMessage("You begin to dig."); } break;

The above will make the spade dig treasure stated in the absX and absY and ONLY will it dig them items up on that exact spot with the required item.

Next, underneath you will need to put your Caskets in.

case 405: deleteItem(405, getItemSlot(405), 3); addItem(ITEMID, 1); addItem(ITEMID, 1); addItem(ITEMID, 1); sendMessage("*optional, I used this for declaring my clues by a name*"); sendMessage("You found *Treasure here*"); break;

That’s your rewards.

Finally, you must add your interface.

case 2677: //lvl 1 clue showInterface(3023); sendQuest("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("@gre@LVL 1. Clue", 3026);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 3027);//Line 2 sendQuest("", 3028);//Line 3 sendQuest("", 3029);//Line 4 sendQuest("", 3030);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 3031);//Line 6 sendQuest("", 3032);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 3033);//Line 8 sendQuest("", 3034);//Line 9 sendQuest("", 3035);//Line 10 sendQuest("", 3036);//Line 11 sendQuest("", 3037);//Line 12 break;[/b][/center]

Okay, so the clue isn’t random rewards. I’m sorry I’m not the best coder. But at least I offer BASIC clues.

If this helped, then I hope you enjoy. Deltascape does not need this as it’s already got clues.

Also, sorry I’m no good at this, I suck at tutorials.

Read full topic
